summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingDrunk Elephant's A-Passioni Retinol Cream is a cutting-edge formula that combines 1.0% vegan retinol with nourishing, superfood-rich ingredients to dramatically diminish the appearance of fine lines, deep wrinkles, and sun damage.
details: DetailsBenefitsVisibly restores bounce, resilience, and clarity to skinHelps to even skin tone and texture - without redness and irritationReplenishes essential lipids and moistureAntioxidants help defend against environmental stressorsDermatologist TestedFormulated at a skin-friendly pH of 5.8Key Ingredients1.0% Retinol: Improves the look and feel of uneven skin tone and texture while warding off damageTriple-Peptide Blend: Helps visibly firm and strengthen, boosting the age-fighting benefits of retinolVitamin F: Fatty acids work to improve the look of texture and suppleness and help calm skinResearch ResultsIn a clinical study with 31 people after 8 weeks:100% showed improvement in firmness and elasticity96% showed reduced lines and wrinkles93% showed improvement in textureItem 2588469How To UseMorning or night, apply a pea-size amount or less to a clean, dry face, avoiding the eye area. May be mixed with any Drunk Elephant cream or oil. Limit initial use to once or twice a week, gradually increasing frequency to every other night, and then every night as tolerated. Always use a broad-spectrum sunscreen such as Umbra Sheer or Umbra Tinte. Retinol products are not recommended for use by pregnant or nursing mothers. Always check with your doctor before using any new products while pregnant or nursing.Tip: Mix with B-Hydra for an extra shot of hydration and vitamin B.Smoothie tips: "ABC Smoothie"- 1 pump A-Passioni + 1 pump B-Hydra + 1 pump C-Firma, for smoother, brighter, more hydrated skin.How to Recycle:Pop off the top, unscrew the clear vial from the top, recycle the vial + outer container.IngredientsWater/Aqua/Eau, Glycerin, Coco-Caprylate, Stearic Acid, Coconut Alkanes, Glyceryl Stearate, Niacinamide, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Cetearyl Alcohol, Pentylene Glycol, Passiflora Edulis Seed Oil, Retinol, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Sclerocarya Birrea Seed Oil, Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Kernel Oil, Cetyl Ethylhexanoate, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1, Palmitoyl Tetrapeptide-7, Brassica Oleracea Acephala Leaf Extract, Brassica Oleracea Italica (Broccoli) Extract, Tetrahexyldecyl Ascorbate, Chrysin, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Linoleic Acid, Linolenic Acid, Ceramide NP, Xanthophylls, Phytosphingosine, Phytosterols, Jojoba Esters, Physalis Pubescens Fruit Juice, Stearyl Glycyrrhetinate, Oryza Sativa (Rice Bran) Extract, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Carthamus Tinctorium (Safflower) Seed Oil, Palmitoyl Hexapeptide-12, Cetyl Palmitate, Trehalose, Lauric Acid, Sodium Hyaluronate Crosspolymer, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Glucosamine HCL, Tocopheryl Acetate, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Pisum Sativum (Pea) Extract, Tocopherol, Bambusa Vulgaris Leaf/Stem Extract, Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol, Carbomer, Trideceth-6 Phosphate, N-Hydroxysuccinimide, Ceteareth-20, Sodium Hydroxide, Laureth-23, Steareth-20, Propanediol, Chlorhexidine Digluconate, Polysorbate 20, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Chlorphenesin, Potassium Sorbate, Ethylhexylglycerin. B-Hydra Intensive Hyudration Serum 1 oz Ingredients: Water/Aqua/Eau, Coconut Alkanes, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/VP Copolymer, Glycerin, Pentylene Glycol, Sclerocarya Birrea Seed Oil, Wheat Amino Acids, Ananas Sativus (Pineapple) Fruit Extract, Berberis Vulgaris Root Extract, Citrullus Lanatus (Watermelon) Fruit Extract, Lens Esculenta (Lentil) Fruit Extract, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Panthenol, Sodium PCA, Sodium Hyaluronate Crosspolymer, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Niacinamide, Cyclodextrin, Sodium Hyaluronate, Sodium Lactate, Phenoxyethanol, Hydroxyproline, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Citric Acid, Caprylyl Glycol, Chlorphenesin, Ethylhexylglycerin.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Morning or night, apply a pea-size amount or less to a clean, dry face, avoiding the eye area. May be mixed with any Drunk Elephant cream or oil. Limit initial use to once or twice a week, gradually increasing frequency to every other night, and then every night as tolerated. Always use a broad-spectrum sunscreen such as Umbra Sheer or Umbra Tinte. Retinol products are not recommended for use by pregnant or nursing mothers. Always check with your doctor before using any new products while pregnant or nursing.Tip: Mix with B-Hydra for an extra shot of hydration and vitamin B.Smoothie tips: "ABC Smoothie"- 1 pump A-Passioni + 1 pump B-Hydra + 1 pump C-Firma, for smoother, brighter, more hydrated skin.How to Recycle:Pop off the top, unscrew the clear vial from the top, recycle the vial + outer container.
ingredients: Ethylhexylglycerin. B-Hydra Intensive Hyudration Serum 1 oz Ingredients: Water/Aqua/Eau

reviews.headline: It actually works and fast!
reviews.comments: I bought this 6 days ago. I used it the night I bought it and went to use it again 3 days later and I had already noticed a significant difference in my forehead wrinkles! I am 33 and I have been tanning every day without sunscreen so the forehead wrinkles are new. I have used it twice now, spaced 3 days apart and OMG the wrinkles are almost diminished! I rate this product a 10/10 and I would DEFINETLY buy this product again! I haven't had ANY sides affects or irritation from using it either! Run, dont walk and go buy this AMAZING product!

reviews.headline: 3rd bottle
reviews.comments: I try to not rebuy this because of the price. The way this makes my skin feel is just unmatched. Smoother and visibly softer.

reviews.headline: HG day retinol cream
reviews.comments: The Drunk Elephant retinols make my skin so happy! I use A-Passioni cream and the A-Gloel every day with a dollop of the A-Shaba on the eyes and I am good to go with a little spf. Keeps my skin feeling moist and smooth all day with no burn (I am not a retinol beginner).  Love these produxts, and yeah the funky smell and texture is because these are clean products instead of chemicals! ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è

reviews.headline: Not worth it
reviews.comments: I've been through 3 bottles and haven't noticed any significant difference in my skin. It was helpful when I had some breakouts in clearing them in a timely manner, but other than that, nothing. I decided to branch out recently and try another retinol product from a different brand, and I'm realizing what I've been missing out on, and at a lower price point! Overall, I don't hate it, but it really did nothing for my skin.

reviews.headline: This is not a promotional review
reviews.comments: I love it! I have a combination skin. My t zone always gets oily with white heads. I started using it last year and it really helped clear and brightened up my face. I continue to use it since it keeps white heads away and oiliness at bay.

reviews.headline: I would buy this again
reviews.comments: Love the way it leaves my skin feeling.  I wasn't going to try but had to check it out.  And it was definitely worth my gold coins.

reviews.headline: Looks like a free sample
reviews.comments: Smaller than the free samples it came with

reviews.headline: I am a repeat buyer.
reviews.comments: It is a strong product that must be used as directed. If used properly it will reveal a brighter, better looking skin.

reviews.headline: Did nothing for me
reviews.comments: No negative side effects even using it overnight. But I noticed absolutely no difference in my skin after 2 months. It's way too expensive to not show any improvements.

reviews.headline: Love
reviews.comments: I love this product (this skincare line period). I havent been dissatisfied yet but im always sad when my bottle runs out. My only con is that its pricey but I feel like its worth it and my skin agrees. If I could only afford one thing I would hands down buy this. I recommend using at night because its not really all that lightweight but doesnt cause me to breakout. I can also mix with moisturizer from the same brand (or different) and it does not affect the performance

reviews.headline: The best ever had
reviews.comments: This retinol does work.  I tried others that I have been recommended and it has just been a waste of resources.  I come back this one which do show results in one day.  I can see my skin fresh and renewed.  Great results and no irritation at all.  Love it!

reviews.headline: Perfect and we'll worth the money
reviews.comments: I've tried a lot of retinols and this the first to really wow me. Not only that but my skin loves it. My normally dry skins feels soft and smooth. This will definitely be on the list for a repeat purchase.

reviews.headline: Awesome
reviews.comments: I've had this product for about 4 months and immediately noticed a difference in my dark spots and acne scars. They go away much faster then normal while using this product. I noticed a difference in 2 days, my scars began to get closer to my skin color.

reviews.headline: Great product
reviews.comments: I recently switched to drunk elephant from another product line. It's been about a month and so far I'm loving it. My skin feels amazing and looks healthy.

reviews.headline: Peeling
reviews.comments: let me preface this by saying I did not read the instructions before using, so I slathered on what was in the sample packet I had of this - my face (two days later) is now peeling and dry... so just beware - don't use too much! also would like to petition to have the instructions be a little larger so I don't skip them next time lol.

reviews.headline: I would recommend this product!
reviews.comments: This product took away all of my wrinkles, now my grandchild thinks I'm young like them! ü•∞

reviews.headline: Do not purchase
reviews.comments: This is my 4th time buying this product, and unlike other times, it made my face red, swollen and with little bumps. I reached-out to Drunk Elephant for support, and their customer service would not return my email.

reviews.headline: So far so good!
reviews.comments: I've been using a small amount at night before bed for the past three days. Followed with the protini moisturiser.  I can already see a small amount of significance on my face. My face feels smooth and softer, and my acne is getting smaller. No problems with dryness or breakouts. Pores seem to be shrinking. (I have sensitive, acne-prone skin and this hasn't bothered me)

reviews.headline: broke out
reviews.comments: this was the only new thing i added to my skincare regimen. used it twice at the recommended amount and application and on the second day broke out nearly all over my face

reviews.headline: Drying and flaky
reviews.comments: Too expensive for what it is

faceoff_positive.comments: This retinol is the best i have found. It works well for smoothing fine wrinkles.
faceoff_positive.headline: Retinol

faceoff_negative.comments: I really wanted to love this. I gave it 3 stars because it was not "terrible," but I also felt like for the price point it was not any different than using a drug store brand. I did not experience any dryness at all, which I had expected until my face adjusted to the retinol. That's not a bad thing, as my face is already dry, but I didn't feel that it was working. In fact, I used it daily without any change in my skin. I would not purchase this product again.
faceoff_negative.headline: Not impressed.
